replies.msg:
圖1之1 - （看看新聞KNEWS片段截圖／明報製圖）

上海一名2歲半孩童，上月底玩母親的手機時，連續按錯密碼6至7次，結果導致鎖機；手機更顯示，要在47年後才能解鎖。蘋果公司稱，唯一解決方法是恢復原廠設定，但因手機內有相片等重要資料，機主不願重設手機。

上海嘉定一名母親陸女士，某天沒帶電話外出，其2歲半孩童嚷著要玩手機，家中老人便把陸女士的iPhone給他玩。怎料孩童連續按錯密碼6至7次，手機即時被鎖，並顯示「iPhone已停用」，其下方更指，用家要在超過2500萬分鐘後再試一次，即47年後才能解鎖。

陸女士諮詢蘋果公司員工，員工稱只能等待滿47年後可重試的一刻，又或恢復原廠設定，但無法先取回手機內的資料。陸女士指，因手機內有重要資料，包括照片及通訊錄等，她不願重設手機。

陸女士為了保住手機內的資料，她等了近2個月，以待其他解決方法；惟手機的時間開始錯亂，踏入3月，手機顯示的日期卻是1月初。事件讓她非常苦惱，雖不願重設手機，但也不可能等40多年，稱「40多年後我自己都說不動話了，難道還要跟孫子說這是你爸爸惹的禍」。

蘋果公司技術工程師韋春龍指，第一次鎖機時，手機會停用約1分鐘，之後會停用5分鐘或半小時；其後停用時間是隨機而訂，停用80年也可以。他已向蘋果公司反映情况，蘋果回覆指這是為了確保手機資料安全，以防有人撞破密碼，盜取手機資料。

（ 梨視頻／看看新聞KNEWS）

利申: an狗

其後停用時間是隨機而訂，停用80年也可以。

隨機 on 9 架， 玩抽獎呀

As the journalist and Apple Store staff tested, if you insert the wrong passcode for 1 to 5 times, there will only be red notifications saying the passcode is wrong, and you needn’t wait to give it another try.

For the 6th time you insert a wrong passcode, it will report, “iPhone is disabled, try again in 1 minute”. And the phone will be locked, and you won’t be able to insert passcode again until 1 minute later.

For the 7th time, the iPhone will show, “iPhone is disabled, try again in 5 minutes”.

For the 8th time, the iPhone will be locked for 15 minutes, and for the 9th time, it will be locked for 60 minutes to insert passcode again.

If you insert the wrong passcode for 10th time, the iPhone will be disabled and you will have to connect it to iTunes to unlock.

How to fix it if your iPhone is disabled?

If your iPhone is disabled and has to be connected to iTunes, you can connect it to an authorized computer, and the Enter Passcode window will show again. If you insert the right passcode this time, your iPhone will be all right again.

https://9to5mac.com/community/incredible-iphone-is-disabled-try-again-in-23614974-minutes/

For the 6th time you insert a wrong passcode, it will report, “iPhone is disabled, try again in 1 minute”. And the phone will be locked, and you won’t be able to insert passcode again until 1 minute later.

For the 7th time, the iPhone will show, “iPhone is disabled, try again in 5 minutes”.

For the 8th time, the iPhone will be locked for 15 minutes, and for the 9th time, it will be locked for 60 minutes to insert passcode again.

If you insert the wrong passcode for 10th time, the iPhone will be disabled and you will have to connect it to iTunes to unlock.

How to fix it if your iPhone is disabled?

If your iPhone is disabled and has to be connected to iTunes, you can connect it to an authorized computer, and the Enter Passcode window will show again. If you insert the right passcode this time, your iPhone will be all right again.

韋春龍根本就係假既，

果d咩隨機，80年，都係佢自己幻想出嚟


①連續錯誤輸入密碼第1至5次：顯示紅色並提示密碼不正確，可以繼續重新輸入，不需等待時間；

②連續第6次輸錯密碼：顯示「iPhone已停用，請1分鐘後再輸入一次」。在接下來的一分鐘內，手機處於鎖定狀態，即使知道了正確的密碼，也找不到密碼框；

③連續第7次輸錯密碼：5分鐘內無法操作；

④連續第8次輸錯密碼：15分鐘內無法操作；

⑤連續第9次輸錯密碼：60分鐘內無法操作；

⑥連續第10次輸錯密碼：顯示「iPhone已停用，連接iTunes」。該情況下，無論等待多長時間都沒有機會再出現密碼框。

同一單野蘋果都全面過佢，明報真係今非昔比

韋春龍根本就係假既，
Iphone4時代都已經係咁，
果d咩隨機，80年，都係佢自己幻想出嚟


①連續錯誤輸入密碼第1至5次：顯示紅色並提示密碼不正確，可以繼續重新輸入，不需等待時間；

②連續第6次輸錯密碼：顯示「iPhone已停用，請1分鐘後再輸入一次」。在接下來的一分鐘內，手機處於鎖定狀態，即使知道了正確的密碼，也找不到密碼框；

③連續第7次輸錯密碼：5分鐘內無法操作；

④連續第8次輸錯密碼：15分鐘內無法操作；

⑤連續第9次輸錯密碼：60分鐘內無法操作；

⑥連續第10次輸錯密碼：顯示「iPhone已停用，連接iTunes」。該情況下，無論等待多長時間都沒有機會再出現密碼框。

quote.msg:
As the journalist and Apple Store staff tested, if you insert the wrong passcode for 1 to 5 times, there will only be red notifications saying the passcode is wrong, and you needn’t wait to give it another try.

For the 6th time you insert a wrong passcode, it will report, “iPhone is disabled, try again in 1 minute”. And the phone will be locked, and you won’t be able to insert passcode again until 1 minute later.

For the 7th time, the iPhone will show, “iPhone is disabled, try again in 5 minutes”.

For the 8th time, the iPhone will be locked for 15 minutes, and for the 9th time, it will be locked for 60 minutes to insert passcode again.

If you insert the wrong passcode for 10th time, the iPhone will be disabled and you will have to connect it to iTunes to unlock.

How to fix it if your iPhone is disabled?

If your iPhone is disabled and has to be connected to iTunes, you can connect it to an authorized computer, and the Enter Passcode window will show again. If you insert the right passcode this time, your iPhone will be all right again.

https://9to5mac.com/community/incredible-iphone-is-disabled-try-again-in-23614974-minutes/

其實呢，大陸同香港啲記者係咪呃飯食

replies.msg:
你自己貼條LINK入面都係咁講:

其實在此之前，就因為密碼輸入錯誤太多次，被停用了約 1 分鐘，那為什麼會突然變成 45 年？


變成這樣需要達到其中幾個條件



一、密碼輸入錯誤多次，達到停用 1 次或以上（首要條件）

二、電池異常、過度放電、低電壓

三、移除過電池

四、連接座異常

五、電池未固定

replies.msg:
其實我前面英文果篇文已經係2014年, 對應返年份應該係iOS8或之前版本

我貼多次, 人地記者搵埋職員一齊試都冇隨機呢個問題
As the journalist and Apple Store staff tested, if you insert the wrong passcode for 1 to 5 times, there will only be red notifications saying the passcode is wrong, and you needn’t wait to give it another try.

For the 6th time you insert a wrong passcode, it will report, “iPhone is disabled, try again in 1 minute”. And the phone will be locked, and you won’t be able to insert passcode again until 1 minute later.

For the 7th time, the iPhone will show, “iPhone is disabled, try again in 5 minutes”.

For the 8th time, the iPhone will be locked for 15 minutes, and for the 9th time, it will be locked for 60 minutes to insert passcode again.

If you insert the wrong passcode for 10th time, the iPhone will be disabled and you will have to connect it to iTunes to unlock.

至於果個蘋果技術工程師


https://youtu.be/xON7ZjTFmYg?t=53s
